@graph.name: FAIR Research Objects and Computational Workflows – A Linked Data Approach
@graph.description: RO-Crate of PhD thesis submitted to the University of Amsterdam

@graph.name: Evaluating FAIR Digital Object and Linked Data as distributed object systems
RO-Crate metadata file for FDO-LD paper
Chapter 2: Background
@graph.description: In this chapter, we discuss the related work with respect to FAIR Digital Objects and Linked Data. We do so by looking through the lens of development of these technologies over time, including future directions.

@graph.name: Chapter 3: FAIR Digital Objects and Linked Data

Supplement 5: Semantic micro-contributions with decentralized nanopublication services
Supplement 6: Perspectives on automated composition of workflows in the life sciences

Supplement 9: A Community Roadmap for Scientific Workflows Research and Development

Supplement 12: Sharing interoperable workflow provenance: A review of best practices and their practical application in CWLProv
